track.name: As The Years Go Passing By
comments: soulful, heartfelt blues.   albert is so great.  spans genres.  just great period.
This is the difference between thrashing a guitar because you think it's cool to make a lot of noise, and makin the thing TALK

He is a soulful and energetic performer who brings the best of what people love about music together in one total package: great stage presence and quality sound. His guitar is powerful and inviting in a way that makes you want to hear more. He also has the ability to create an exciting atmosphere anywhere. He can deliver his message on a broadly appealing level with a sincerity that comes through every note and every word.
How great is this..Sing it Albert.
sweet sweet sweet.   Got turned on to this great track after listening to Jo Baker sing it with the Elvin Bishop Group in about 1971.  Albert could really do it.
Influenced several great musicians. A true blues legend. so smooth.
You know my love will follow you as the years go passin by...
I can feel the passion in this song, thru the gutiar and lyrics Awesome.
blues, genau wie ich ihn mag
